job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Application Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using and improving existing AI systems for customer support rather than developing or engineering AI models. While it mentions AI training and fine-tuning, the core responsibilities are application support and integrating human expertise with AI, not core AI development.

phrases: improve the AI system
AI Training and Improvement
participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate involvement in refining and adapting AI models, which falls under the 'Modeling' category, specifically fine-tuning and testing new AI approaches.

phrases: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: This phrase suggests the integration of AI capabilities into a support system, which can involve software development aspects to connect different components and deliver a functional solution.

phrases: Application Support Engineer
Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems
apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: The role is framed around customer support and analyzing tickets, indicating a need to understand the business context of customer issues and how AI can be applied to solve them.

phrases: ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities
soft_skills.justification: The aggressive ramp-up timeline and the need to integrate diverse capabilities highlight the importance of rapid learning and adaptability.

phrases: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems
apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
close the gap by improving the AI system
Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback
Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
unblocking yourself
soft_skills.justification: The role requires analyzing complex issues, identifying AI limitations, providing feedback for improvement, and independently solving problems, all indicative of strong problem-solving and pragmatic skills.

phrases: improving the AI system
Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
unblocking yourself
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on improving AI systems, prototyping new tools, and self-sufficiency points towards a need for initiative, ownership, and innovative thinking.
